data.name: Coldage Demo
data.short_description: This "demo" is our laboratory, it is not complete or balanced, and it is without gameplay instructions. If you would like to have a look into the engine room, you are welcome. However this is not a game or representative of what the final product will look like

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU 2.0 Ghz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000 GPU / AMD HD 5450 / Nvidia 9400 GT
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OSX 10.9.5+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256mb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains drug and alcohol use, some violence, possible nudity, and foul language.
